Class AssembleUseCase

java.lang.Object
ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline.AssembleUseCase
public final class AssembleUseCase extends Object
Replays captured segment records to reconstruct higher-level protocol message pairs.

Coordinates the FlowProcessingEngine with persistence and metrics. Not thread-safe; intended for single-threaded batch execution.

Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc
Implementation Note:
Tracks flow orientation using FlowDirectionService to determine client/server side for synthesized TcpSegment instances.

  • Constructor Details

    • AssembleUseCase

      public AssembleUseCase(AssembleConfig config, FlowAssembler flowAssembler, ProtocolDetector protocolDetector, Map<ProtocolId, Supplier<MessageReconstructor>> reconstructorFactories, Map<ProtocolId, Supplier<PairingEngine>> pairingFactories, PersistencePort persistence, MetricsPort metrics, Set<ProtocolId> enabledProtocols, AssembleUseCase.SegmentReaderFactory readerFactory)
      Creates an assemble use case with the supplied ports and factories.
      Parameters:
      config - assemble configuration describing inputs and protocol toggles
      flowAssembler - assembler that supplies ordered byte streams per TCP flow
      protocolDetector - detects protocols for new flows
      reconstructorFactories - factories for protocol-specific message reconstructors
      pairingFactories - factories for protocol-specific pairing engines
      persistence - sink that stores materialized MessagePair instances
      metrics - metrics sink for per-stage counters
      enabledProtocols - protocols that should be processed; others are skipped
      readerFactory - supplier of AssembleUseCase.SegmentRecordReader instances bound to AssembleConfig
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run() throws Exception
      Streams segment records through the flow engine and persists resulting message pairs.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reading records, processing flows, or persisting results fails
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • segmentIoReaderFactory

      public static AssembleUseCase.SegmentReaderFactory segmentIoReaderFactory()
      Creates a AssembleUseCase.SegmentReaderFactory that streams serialized segments via SegmentIoAdapter.
      Returns:
      factory producing file-based segment readers
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
